text: aur un mushrikon ne balapoorvak shapathen leen ki yadi hamaare paas koee aayat (nishaanee) aa jaaye, to ham usapar avashy eemaan laayenge. aap kah den: aayaten (nishaaniyaan) to allaah hee ke paas hain aur (he eemaan vaalo!) tumhen kya pata ki vah nishaaniyaan jab aa jaayengee, to ve eemaan[1] nahin laayenge
